title: About
text:
Passionate about EBM, clinical research, and HTA, I earned my MD and PhD at the University of Chieti and Pescara, Italy. At present, I am studying an MSc in Health Economics, Outcomes and Management at the London School of Economics (class of 2025).
During an international PhD, I have researched extensively on cardiac MRI with particular focus on its diagnostic and prognostic value in patients with angina, cardiomyopathies, and following heart transplantation.
I am up for collaboration. Have a look at y publications, download a copy of my CV, or drop me an e-mail at bisacciagiandomenico (at) gmail (dot) com.
